H0.text: Which river is spanned by Abraham Darby's Iron Bridge. Thames

H1.text: Which river is spanned by Abraham Darby's Iron Bridge. Trent

H2.text: Which river is spanned by Abraham Darby's Iron Bridge. Avon

H3.text: Which river is spanned by Abraham Darby's Iron Bridge. Severn

A4.text: The Iron Bridge across the Severn, built in 1779, was the first cast-iron arch bridge ever constructed.

A5.text: The Iron Bridge at Ironbridge was the world's first iron arch bridge.
